h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Auspicious Lantern Location
content: The Auspicious Lantern can be found in the Pagoda Realm in The New West upon killing all 9 of the Lantern-Wardens within the lower, middle, and upper Pagoda. These only spawn on the outer edge of the prison when the bell sounds and your health is halved.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Auspicious_Lantern.md', within the main section titled 'Auspicious Lantern', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Auspicious Lantern Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Auspicious Lantern can be found in the Pagoda Realm in The New West upon killing all 9 of the Lantern-Wardens within the lower, middle, and upper Pagoda. These only spawn on the outer edge of the prison when the bell sounds and your health is halved.
